profile.heroDesc: Problem Solver • Tech Enthusiast • Polymath. Transforming complex challenges into elegant solutions through technology and interdisciplinary thinking.
profile.about: I am a talented learner who gracefully chases knowledge across all domains. My polymathic approach blends technology, creativity, and strategy to solve complex problems from unique perspectives. Each new skill I acquire becomes another tool in my arsenal for creating innovative, impactful solutions.

projects.title: Cube Runner 3D
projects.description: A fast-paced 3D running game built with Python. Navigate obstacles, collect power-ups, and beat your high score in this immersive runner experience.
